item.title: A HTML Quine
item.author: pranavgade20@gmail.com (Pranav Gade)
item.description: Background A quine is a program that produces its source code as its output. Now, although HTML is not a programming language, but a markup language, CSS is a turing complete language as long as you consider the accompanying HTML as well. So, this is technically a description of a HTML+CSS quine, but I think saying HTML is sufficient. I was introduced to the idea of a quine in the book GÃ¶del, Escher, Bach: An Eternal Golden Braid, by Douglas Hofstadter.
item.dc:creator: Pranav Gade
